issue.title: rosservice call /srcsim/finals/start_task 1 3 does not move to finish

content.raw:
You accomplish checkpoint 3 when you reach the finish box. You must walk from the satellite to the finish box to do that.

When you skip to a checkpoint, you're placed in a position as if you had completed the previous one.

If you skip to task 2 checkpoint 1, you'll be in the finish box ;)
content.html:
You accomplish checkpoint 3 when you reach the finish box. You must walk from the satellite to the finish box to do that.

When you skip to a checkpoint, you're placed in a position as if you had completed the previous one.

If you skip to task 2 checkpoint 1, you'll be in the finish box ;)
